Entries.default: "There's no need for you to be here after hours. Move along."
"What if it's an emergency?"
"Farewell."
[Lie.] "I left some important papers behind."
"I have Governor Alvari's permission to pass."
[Attack] "Nice looking headquarters. Would be a pity if someone painted it with your blood."
The guard places two fingers in her mouth and lets out a piercing whistle. She advances with her weapon drawn.
"Everything seems to be in order. Give me but a moment and I'll unlock the door for you."
"If it's that important, then set your mind at ease that I'm here to guard the building, and I won't allow a single sheet of parchment to cross the threshold under my watch."
"If it has anything to do with paperwork or wax seals, which covers most of what's in the building, I'm confident it can wait until morning."
"Go in, sir."
"Evening."
"If you've come on business with the Vailian Trading Company, it will have to wait until morning. We're closed." The guard tips her head in warning.
"Headquarters are still closed, sir."
"Perhaps we can arrive at a mutually beneficial understanding?"
"If you're interested in making a donation, I'd accept it with thanks - but the doors stay closed."
"Here's a coin for your trouble."
"I don't have any money."
"Back to my previous questions."
"If it involves a spirited discussion of letting you into headquarters, you're wasting your time, but go ahead."
"Well, it wouldn't have made a difference anyway. Don't go looking to me for charity."
"Much appreciated, aimico." She pockets your coin.
Entries.female: "Much appreciated, aimica." She pockets your coin.
